item.title: CVE-2024-8751|2024-09-12T21:38:37.516Z -- sick%20ag -- sick%20msc800
item.description: A vulnerability in the MSC800 allows an unauthenticated attacker to modify the productâ€™s IP address over Sopas ET. This can lead to Denial of Service. Users are recommended to upgrade both MSC800 and MSC800 LFT to version V4.26 and S2.93.20 respectively which fixes this issue.
